message: Let's split the money in a 3:2 ratio. This offers a fair compromise considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I'm willing to take a slightly lower share to avoid further rounds, but I'm not giving up too much. Your turn to decide!
Considering the decrease in the value of money, let's aim for an equal split to ensure fairness across rounds. This proposal aims to balance our shares while accounting for inflation.
I'm willing to make a concession to get closer to an equal split, but I'm not giving up too much ground. Your turn to decide!
